name: Blades of Morality
description:
Are you ready to pay the price for your morals? Time to decide what's most important to you.

 

Play as yourself with the responsibility to take care of your starving family. Apply as a Blade recruit, an order of warriors that seek and destroy mages in the world. This is your chance to feed your starving family.

Your mission,  kill the mages hiding in the city of Nilla.  Journey with fellow Blades, forge bonds and improve your skill on the way.  For every kill, you and your family will get 6 months of food.

Sound simple right?

It never is...

With over 20 endings(Bad endings included) that all depend on your choices and values.  Test your strength of character and learn more about the conflict between Mages and Blades.

Based on Elros, a world I built on World Anvil a while back for D&D. If it interests you then feel free to use it for your next campaign. Tell me about it, I would love feedback on the world.
